## Runtime.Context.ContextQualifierProviderValidators.create() method

Creates the appropriate validator type based on the provider's mutability.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create<T extends IContextQualifierProvider>(provider: T): T extends IMutableContextQualifierProvider ? MutableContextQualifierProviderValidator : ReadOnlyContextQualifierProviderValidator;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

provider


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The context qualifier provider to wrap.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T extends IMutableContextQualifierProvider ? MutableContextQualifierProviderValidator : ReadOnlyContextQualifierProviderValidator

A read-only validator for read-only providers, or a mutable validator for mutable providers.
